sentences: He has been working professionally since 1995 since his first project Professional Murder Music featured in the hit Arnold Schwarzenegger film End of Days and he has participated on tours and albums with a number of notable bands and artists, including Skinny Puppy, ohGr, My Life With The Thrill Kill Kult, Peter Murphy and Rozz Williams as well as forming his own projects kETvECTOR, Bahntier, Askew, American Memory Project, and The Implicate Order.
In spring 2010 he toured with My Life with the Thrill Kill Kult and Bahntier.
